Posts.Content: I brushed my teeth after every meal, including roof of mouth and tongue, rinsed with Corsodyl alcohol free mouthwash and also used the salt and water mouthwash prescribed by the chemo unit. This certainly helped to minimise the oral thrush and I didn't get any mouth ulcers either. I have just complete FEC-T last week xxxxx Â
Posts.Title: Oral thrush side effect of chemo
